posts.content:
I have the original seat covers from my ‘66 split screen available.

I believe that these are ‘mesh grey’ although am sure I’ll be corrected if they aren’t

As they are original, they’re in well used condition as follows:

Drivers Seat: no tears to seat surface, but minor tear on side of the seat cover.

2/3 passenger bench seat: has a minor tear on the seating surface of the base cover, partially along the seam and then at a 90 degree angle not along a seam. The back rest cover does not have any damage and is on great condition.

These tears could be repaired, or they make a very useable set of original covers.

I also have the 3 of the 4 original horsehair/ coconut type pads/ cushions as follows:

1) drivers base
2) drivers back test
3) 2/3 bench base

NOTE: the seat frames are not included, 4x covers and 3x pads only.

Sold as a set, £199 for the lot.

Thanks,
Will

Hi Will. Would you be interested in selling the seat pads separately at all? If so what price?
Many thanks
Steve

cavendish wrote: ↑Wed Jan 15, 2020 12:15 am Hi Will. Would you be interested in selling the seat pads separately at all? If so what price?
Many thanks
Steve
I have sent you a PM
Thanks but I have sourced some now.

Price reduced to £199. This is for 3x seat pads and 4x seat covers.

I’d rather these go to A good home rather than get thrown away. I don’t have the space to keep them so am open to offers.
